subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In the six games before Friday’s contest against the Suns, Stephon Marbury was at his swaggering, scoring and playmaking best, averaging 22.5 points and 7.7 assists.
snippet: In the six games before Friday’s contest against the Suns, Stephon Marbury was at his swaggering, scoring and playmaking best, averaging 22.5 points and 7.7 assists.
